pages.title: The Computer
pages.text: Once you reached level $(#0A0)#min_computer_level#$(), you unlock the computer. It makes accepting and managing contracts easier.$(br2)Note that once you reached this level you won't receive any more contracts in your mailbox.
With the computer you can buy items, receive E-Mails and view your active contracts. $(br2)The computer needs to be supplied with energy to be operational.

pages.title: The Minternet Program
pages.text: With the power of the Minternet you can access Minazon - The number one delivery service in Minecraft. Minazon offers a wide variety of items, that you can unlock when you reach a certain level.$(br)You can spend the money you earned from contracts here. With over night shipping your orders will be in your your Mailbox at the next morning.

pages.title: The E-Mail Program
pages.text: In the E-Mail program, you can receive E-Mails from contractors and get notified when a new item is available on Minazon.$(br)When opening an E-Mail from a contractor, you can see the overview of the contract, its requirements and rewards. This is also the place where you can accept the contract.

pages.title: The Notes Program
pages.text: The notes program replaces the functionality of the bulletin board. You have an overview of all active tasks and your current level.
